name: Elara Moonwhisper
backstory: A scholar of ancient magic from the Evermeet archives, Elara discovered references to the Frostborn Prophecy in texts thought lost to time. She joined the party to research the prophecy firsthand and find magical solutions to the growing threat.

abilities.name: Arcane Recovery
abilities.description: Recover spell slots on short rest

recent_quote.text: The texts were right - the frost magic here is unlike anything I've studied!
